keyword: in n out milkshake xlarge calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Xlarge Milkshake
meta_description: Discover in n out milkshake xlarge calories: about 590 kcal per serving, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, fat, protein, and FAQs on variations.
assumptions: Chocolate flavor, extra large size (approx. 24 oz), made with vanilla ice cream, milk, chocolate syrup; includes whipped cream topping.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, exact size, customizations, and location; values based on standard In-N-Out data. Check app or receipt for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One extra large In-N-Out milkshake contains about 590 kcal, with high sugar and fat content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out xlarge milkshake?
faqs.a: Approximately 590 kcal for a chocolate extra large milkshake.

faqs.q: What's the sugar content in In-N-Out xlarge milkshake?
faqs.a: About 66 g of sugars per serving, mostly from syrup and ice cream.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out xlarge milkshakes high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 28 g total fat, including 18 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Calories in vanilla vs chocolate In-N-Out xlarge milkshake?
faqs.a: Similar at ~590 kcal; flavors vary slightly but not significantly.

faqs.q: Does size affect In-N-Out milkshake calories?
faqs.a: Yes, xlarge (24 oz) is higher than regular (16 oz, ~400 kcal); confirm with staff.
